item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to BoB Birmingham Cycling Club Assalamu Alaykum We are part of the national Brothers on Bike Cycling Club. We are a friendly local cycling club sharing faith-based values with our members. You are welcome to join us on our group rides. Please consider the following rules: Clothing rules - tl;dr version: Baggies only please As a club founded by observant Muslims, we expect cyclists joining our rides to adhere to the following clothing rules.
